pr_title: Issue #7757: Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - PackageAnnotation

timeline.bodyText: please add comment to explain why it is not compiled.
timeline.author: romani

replies.author: romani

replies.bodyText:
This one is just fine indeed, there's no compilation error with javac.
I'm removing it from directory. Sorry.
Thanks for reviewing.
replies.author: wilcoln

timeline.bodyText: it is kind of strange that this file is not compilable because of annotation. Please share javac output for this file
timeline.author: romani
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@
+//non-compiled with javac: non-compilable annotation, for testing
+@Deprecated
+package org.checkstyle.suppressionxpathfilter.packageannotation; // warn

replies.bodyText:
$ javac SuppressionXpathRegressionPackageAnnotation.java   

SuppressionXpathRegressionPackageAnnotation.java:2: error: package annotations should be in file package-info.java
@Deprecated
^
1 error
replies.author: wilcoln

replies.bodyText: thanks a lot, please change for testing --> should be in file package-info.java
replies.author: romani

timeline.bodyText:
can we add one more  test ? (all others have two tests at least)
I know that there is not that much options, for example with two annotations, or annotation on the same line at least.
timeline.author: romani

timeline.message: Issue #7757: Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - PackageAnnotation
Issue #7757: Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - PackageAnnotation

timeline.bodyText:
there is no reason to work on non-compilable files, we do not support this.
please create package-info.java and do validation on it
timeline.author: romani
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@
+//non-compiled with javac: non-compilable annotation, should be in file package-info.java
+@Deprecated
+package org.checkstyle.suppressionxpathfilter.packageannotation; // warn

timeline.bodyText:
please create one more package-info.java and do validation on it.
all should be compilable. you can create as much packages as we need in Input folder.
timeline.author: romani
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@
+//non-compiled with javac: non-compilable annotation, should be in file package-info.java
+@Deprecated
+@SuppressWarnings
